channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-39208|2024-09-26T14:11:34.888Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20linux
item.description: Improper input validation in Zoom Desktop Client for Linux before version 5.15.10 may allow an unauthenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27243|2024-09-20T14:34:14.212Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- see%20references
item.description: Buffer overflow in some Zoom Workplace Apps and SDK’s may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27244|2024-09-20T14:31:59.382Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20workplace%20vdi%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity in the installer for Zoom Workplace VDI App for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27247|2024-09-20T14:33:08.116Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20macos
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for macOS before version 5.17.10 may allow a privileged user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.
